title: One Hundred Promises: A Small Town Romance (An Aspen Cove Romance Book 4)
features: Wes can’t bear to see her leave.
Will love be enough to keep them together?

Emergency room doctor Lydia Nichols thought her future was set. But when her boyfriend, who was also her boss, walked out the door and into the arms of a nurse, her job left with him.With no boyfriend, no job, and no prospects, Lydia has little choice but to answer the pleas of her sister and head to Aspen Cove to help in their clinic. But small-town life will never be enough. Her plan is to help out and then hightail it out of town. That is, until sinfully sexy contractor Wes Covington comes in seeking emergency care.Wes Covington fled to Aspen Cove looking for the comforts of simple, small-town life. After a lifetime of being almost good enough, almost rich enough, and almost loveable enough, he left behind his high-paying job, his penthouse, and his Porsche to start over. He wants to find acceptance and a woman who loves him for who he is and not what he has in his bank account. When Dr. Lydia heals his wounds, she gives him hope for the future he envisions. She’s the perfect mix of sassy and sweet. The woman is a hellion with a halo, but sadly she’s temporary, or is she?
Take a trip to Aspen Cove, where anything is possible when it comes to love…
description: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Love, determination, power, desire, need, will, pure emotion. (One Hundred Promises Amazon reviewer) ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ "I want more than 5 stars for this fabulous book!" (One Hundred Promises Amazon reviewer)⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ The characters in this series are wonderful and make you want to move to small town Colorado too! —Kristeane B. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ This book tugs at the heartstrings in the most perfect way. Janice P. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Kelly created another homerun with this one! You will not be disappointed! —ReadingBri ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Awesome, heartwarming, loving story! —Carol's Keeper
I LOVE Aspen Cove! Every book holds a part of my heart, and I hope you love reading them as much as I love writing them.
Visit Aspen Cove and fall in love.

International bestselling author of more than fifty novels, Kelly Collins writes with the intention of keeping love alive. Always a romantic, she blends real-life events with her vivid imagination to create characters and stories that lovers of contemporary romance, new adult, and romantic suspense will return to again and again.
